name: Expedient L
description:
Expedient L is a short horror game based on the Backrooms creepypasta.


Controls:
WASD to move.
E to interact.


Resources used:
A Liminal Space - Huuxloc
Hazmat V3 Player - JeffFleetwood
Walkie Talkie - barism09
Smiler Backrooms Entity 3 Rigged - Tzapfron
Tapping the wall with impatience - Dariachic
Hitting hard 10sec - chevy1976
PunchingTheWall - jrsevers3
Slow Monster Growl - Sound Effect for Editing - Amazing Sound FX
Hindquarter Creatures Sound Effect - ΞFRUIT GUYΞ
Light bulb breaking sound effect - Sound Effects Database
